full_text: Russian oligarchs like Alisher Usmanov have been sanctioned by the U.S. So why was his company able to ship 53,000 tons of pig iron into Alabama? https://t.co/nqcRJh0hKc

localize.full_text: Alisher Usmanovのようなロシアのオリガルヒは米国から制裁を受けている。では、なぜ彼の会社はアラバマ州に53,000トンの銑鉄を出荷できたのか？https://t.co/nqcRJh0hKc。
